name: Treize
description:
You come to existence in a strange place you know nothing about, as a being you know just a bit more of. You don't know your goal in this strange land. Explore, fight, make friends or kill everyone as you learn more about this world, its stories and your place in it.

This game features:

  • Smooth movement and a simple yet tough combat system
  • Consistent mechanics, designed with speedrunners in mind
  • The ability to kill everyone
  • The curse of consequence
  • An amazing chiptune OST by TOMES

Additionally, there are unconventional features such as the possibility to play in toki pona and a speedrun clock in dozenal and seximal. Seximal clock can also use jan Misali's time units, for those familiar with them, and Dozenal can use Primel units.

Finally, this is just a demo of the final project, all features mentioned in the list above may not be in at this point in time. If you like it, stay tuned!
